mapper.select: select col_name from column_info where tb_id = (select tb_id from tb_info where concat(db_name, '.', tb_name) = #{ref_table}) and (PK = true or uni = true);
mapper.update: alter table ${db_name}.${tb_name} add constraint ${fk_name} foreign key (${fk_column}) references ${ref_db}.${ref_table} (${ref_column}) on update cascade;
